abstract: Square is bringing peer-to-peer payments to businesses and trying to make money on the venture.
snippet: Square is bringing peer-to-peer payments to businesses and trying to make money on the venture.
lead_paragraph: For the last few years, companies like Google, eBay’s PayPal and Facebook have dabbled in peer-to-peer payments, the business of letting people freely send money to one another through email or on their smartphones. None of these companies have found a way to make money from it.

headline.main: Square Opens Square Cash App to Businesses, for a Fee

abstract: While Google Fiber is growing fast, it is still minuscule compared with its traditional rivals. But it shows the potential for delivering specific kinds of ads to local markets.
snippet: While Google Fiber is growing fast, it is still minuscule compared with its traditional rivals. But it shows the potential for delivering specific kinds of ads to local markets.
lead_paragraph: Cute animals. Addictive jingles. Local sports stars acting awkwardly. These are some of the charming hallmarks of local television ads, and Google would like you to see more of them.

headline.main: Google Fiber Plans Experiment With Targeted Ads for Television
headline.print_headline: Google Plans an Experiment With Targeted Ads for Television
